info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 28 at 3:20PM CDT until August 28 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR EASTERN OGLE AND NORTHEASTERN LEE COUNTIES... At 320 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Machesney Park to near Davis Junction to 8 miles northeast of Sublette, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rochelle, Davis Junction, Hillcrest, Creston, Lindenwood, Monroe Center, Steward and Kings. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 94 and 114. I-88 between mile markers 68 and 82. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
